sentences.sContent: We didn’t have a kitchen in our first apartment and ate out almost every night at hot pot restaurants both cheap and pricey.
sentences.sContent_eng: We didn’t have a kitchen in our first apartment and ate out almost every night at hot pot restaurants both cheap and pricey.
sentences.sCn: 我们的第一个公寓没有厨房，所以差不多每顿晚餐我们都是在或贵或贱的火锅餐厅中解决的。
